column1: Contact Center Operators are the main buyer persona for SmartAssist
SmartAssist can elevate conversations to an agent with context
Autopilot is a combination of Enlighten XO and SmartAssist
Autopilot is not a good solution for businesses that already have chatbots
Copilot for Agents uses primarily addresses agent satisfaction, not CSAT
Copilot for Agents is available on MAX
Copilot for Supervisors gives supervisors a management score based on their effectiveness
Copilot for Supervisors requires Copilot for Agents
